Dracona eyed the base, this would be a good time to try to make a deal with=
 the Maximals. But Dracona was not one to come back to bots who didn't apre=
ciate her. Dracona knew Plintissa was a sucker, the Maximals would use Plin=
tissa again and again but Plintissa would not just leave them! Dracona turn=
ed to Twister.

"A good way to bring them out is to fire at the base." Drac=
ona said. Dracona lifted up a HUGE fifle, a variation of the Heavy Blaster =
Rifle, except this one was so big she had to hold it with both hands. Draco=
na fired at the base's shield...
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: il=
ovealllizards 
  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
  Sent: Wednesday, August 02, 2000=
 4:22 PM
  Subject: Re: Something amiss...


  Twister

  *Twister arives a=
t the Maximal Base out of AutoGun range. She looks at it staring*


    ---=
-- Original Message ----- 
    From: THECODE 
    To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
 =
   Sent: Wednesday, August 02, 2000 4:09 PM
    Subject: Re: Something amis=
s...


    Dracona arives close to the Maximal base, maybe she can do some =
carnage while she was here...
      ----- Original Message ----- 
      Fro=
m: ilovealllizards 
      To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
      Sent: Wednesday, Au=
gust 02, 2000 3:56 PM
      Subject: Re: Something amiss...


      Twister=

       
      *Twister continues walking on in the direction of the Maxima=
l Base*


        ----- Original Message ----- 
        From: THECODE 
    =
    To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
        Sent: Wednesday, August 02, 2000 3:39 P=
M
        Subject: Re: Something amiss...


        Dracona follows Twister=
...
          ----- Original Message ----- 
          From: ilovealllizards=
 
          To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
          Sent: Wednesday, August 02, 2=
000 2:59 PM
          Subject: Re: Something amiss...


          Twister

=

          *Twister looks down and stands up leaving the base*

          T=
wister: I'll be back soon....I hope....

          *Twister says into her C=
ommlink to Dracona as she heads out towards the Maximal Base*


           =
 ----- Original Message ----- 
            From: THECODE 
            To: n=
bwrpg@egroups.com 
            Sent: Wednesday, August 02, 2000 2:20 PM
   =
         Subject: Re: Something amiss...


            Dracona smiles.

   =
         "I suggest you and me take a trip to the Maximal base and find som=
e to kill." Dracona said to Twister...
              ----- Original Message=
 ----- 
              From: ilovealllizards 
              To: nbwrpg@egrou=
ps.com 
              Sent: Wednesday, August 02, 2000 4:27 AM
            =
  Subject: Re: Something amiss...


              Twister
               
 =
              
              *Twister looks at Dracona*

              Twis=
ter: It's not my fault if there are no bots around. I don't know where to f=
ind them. Who would you suggest?

              *Twister asks Dracona*


  =
              ----- Original Message ----- 
                From: THECODE 
=
                To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
                Sent: Wednesday, Au=
gust 02, 2000 1:52 AM
                Subject: Re: Something amiss...


   =
             "I don't know, but if you don't get ready to pay." Dracona sai=
d to Twister...She meant it..
                  ----- Original Message ----=
- 
                  From: ilovealllizards 
                  To: nbwrpg@eg=
roups.com 
                  Sent: Tuesday, August 01, 2000 11:47 PM
      =
            Subject: Re: Something amiss...


                             =
                  Twister


                  *Twister looks at Dracona*

 =
                 Twister: Like who and where would I find someone?

       =
           *Twister asks Dracona*
                    ----- Original Messag=
e ----- 
                    From: THECODE 
                    To: nbwrpg@=
egroups.com 
                    Sent: Tuesday, August 01, 2000 8:45 PM
   =
                 Subject: Something amiss...


                    "Nothing=
, except you should go out and kill someone." Dracona said to Twister...
  =
                    ----- Original Message ----- 
                      Fro=
m: ilovealllizards 
                      To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
         =
             Sent: Tuesday, August 01, 2000 3:46 AM
                      S=
ubject: Re: The End Is Near................................................=
...


                      ~~~~~~Twister~~~~~~
                       
   =
                    
                      *Twister looks at Dracona*

    =
                  Twister: Hi....Anything new?

                      *Twis=
ter asks Dracona while looking at the wall*
